name: NextAuth.js Credentials Authentication
description: Email/password authentication with NextAuth.js v5. Includes login, signup, and session management with bcrypt password hashing.

envVariables.name: AUTH_SECRET
envVariables.description: Secret for NextAuth.js session encryption. Generate with: openssl rand -base64 32

usage.installation: pnpm add next-auth@beta @auth/prisma-adapter bcryptjs && pnpm add -D @types/bcryptjs
usage.configuration:
1. Add AUTH_SECRET and AUTH_URL to .env
2. Copy auth.ts to src/
3. Copy API route to src/app/api/auth/[...nextauth]/
4. Set up Prisma with User model
